about lucyia

Hi,

I am Lucia Kocincova a.k.a. lucyia. I am not a brand.

I am a data visualization and software engineer who blends data, design, interface and animation into a great user experience. While trying to use my work to fight climate breakdown.

After graduating from the Faculty of Informatics at Masaryk University in Brno, I’ve moved to London. And then everything changed.

I love doing collaborations with amazing people but I also try not to spend all my free time in front of a computer (yep, almost like the P versus NP problem). You can see my portfolio and check the code on GitHub.

Slides to talks that I’ve done on some local meetups can be found here. Feedback is very welcome and if you’d like to get in touch regarding anything, you can send me a message.

Enjoy

& Fight climate breakdown!

design & code by lucyia
